input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver

Product keywords:
Chrome/nickel plated for longer life
Industrial tool steel bits, heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, blast finished
Another quality Crescent product
One each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips; 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted; 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver included.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Crescent 6-in-1 Screwdriver is an essential tool for any household or workplace. It includes interchangeable bits for no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips, 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted, and 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdrivers. The industrial tool steel bits are heat treated, tempered, and stress relieved for durability and long life. The chrome/nickel plating adds an extra layer of protection and corrosion resistance. This versatile screwdriver is perfect for DIY projects, home improvement tasks, and basic repairs.
input_text.Response B: We all love Crescent products for their quality. Now try their latest product! Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver is chrome and nickel plated for longer life. The industrial tool steel bits are heat-treated, tempered, stress-relieved, and blast-finished. The screwdriver comes with one each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips, 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted,1/4- and 5/16-inch nut driver.
